Dear Yu Ying Community,

During this time of grief and loss, we are grateful to be part of a community dedicated to equity and social justice. The day after our 5th grade class completed their PYP exhibition on an array of social justice topics, people of all ages and races took to the streets in DC to exercise their civil right to protest police brutality. We fully support peaceful protesters and stand in unity with them. In fact, Yu Ying's mission to inspire and prepare young people to create a better world by challenging them to reach their full potential in a nurturing Chinese/English educational environment, is directly in line with protesters‚Äô stance against violence to create a better world for ALL. Like us, you may be hurting and searching for ways to discuss the tragic events of the past week with your children. A resource that may help is below. We are here with you during this time of tragedy and loss.
